tool_description: Compares available subscription plans and provides recommendations based on user requirements and current usage patterns.

current_plan_id.description: Current subscription plan identifier for comparison

comparison_criteria.description: Criteria for comparison: price, features, streams, quality, content

error_messages: Plan not found: One or more specified plan IDs do not exist.
Invalid comparison criteria: Use valid criteria [price, features, streams, quality, content].
No plans available: No subscription plans are currently available for comparison.
usage: Optionally provide current_plan_id and target_plans for specific comparisons. Use comparison_criteria to focus on specific aspects of the plans.

recommended_plan.description: ID of the recommended plan based on comparison

monthly_prices.description: Monthly prices for each compared plan

feature_comparison.description: Summary of feature differences between plans

savings_potential.description: Potential monthly savings with recommended plan
